response.overview: This short follows the trolls Branch and Poppy as Branch starts to lose control of reality at the hands of an unnamed spirit torturing him. It starts with the two trolls explaining how to spot a gas leak- when really it's something much more sinister. Branch's descent into madness is seen as he turns into song, while his girlfriend Poppy tries to control the situation. Despite this, they both are sucked into the song ("Scream" by Usher) and transported into an alternate reality where they are now "Xander" and "Jenevieve". They agree to stay in this state and Jenevieve apologizes for doubting Xander, as the spirit takes over fully and chaos reigns.
response.title: Family Gas Leak
